title: Some people cascade & go to extremes | assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: and Allah will cure you without any problem unfortunately some of the people Cascade this [Music] into a avenues that were not exposed before so a teacher finds herself suffering from an illness she goes to her class or classes and request that they wash for her or for him and they collect the water from the students and do this this is not valid such Collective effort gaining such water this is not even hygienic so this does not work you have to suspect a particular individual then ask that individual to make this wood or to wash for you in the same fashion and use that not to just hold the hold people in the Masjid or in the neighborhood and ask them to collect such things and Allah Asel Knows Best
